ExploreFact.Text: It's like Desfiladeiro if you turned it inside out so that you're walking on top of the canyon.

RumorFact.Text: The kidnapper may have left clues on a hidden south island on Drip.

ExploreFact.Text: At the south pole of Drip was a small island above the lava. One of Snata's elves (who looked like a tiny Nomai) stated that they knew where Snata was, and that was on the "penis moon".
